PHRASE.Comment: The names of the liturgical months in the nominative case, that is, for use in the format 'Month 2008'.

PHRASE.Value: 主日/,瞻禮二/,瞻禮三/,瞻禮四/,瞻禮五/,預備日/,安息日
PHRASE.Comment: The names of the liturgical week in the nominative case, that is, for use in the format 'Year Month Date Week'.

PHRASE.Value: 主顯月/,獻主月/,福音月/,凱旋月/,聖君月/,使徒月/,先知月/,安息月/,聖架月/,帡幪月/,入殿月/,降生月
PHRASE.Comment: The names of the liturgical months in the genitive case, that is, for use in the format 'Wednesday, 28 March 2008'.

PHRASE.Value: 一月/,二月/,三月/,四月/,五月/,六月/,七月/,八月/,九月/,十月/,十一月/,十二月
PHRASE.Comment: The names of the civil months in the genitive case, that is, for use in the format 'Wednesday, 28 March 2008'.

PHRASE.Value: 星期天/,星期一/,星期二/,星期三/,星期四/,星期五/,星期六
PHRASE.Comment: The names of the civil week in the nominative case, that is, for use in the format 'Year Month Date Week'.

Version/,波諾馬里 is designed to provide the user with access to understand and experience the richness and beauty of the Orthodox tradition. The 程序 is currently in its developmental phase./,在波諾馬里項目中，我們認為禮典信息應當免費——也就是說不收費也不受版權的制約。上帝並沒有保留聖經的版權，聖約安也沒有保留《八音集》的版權。您可以從本站獲得任何東西並用於任何用途，只要您信任我們。如果您要發佈您自己對本站信息的修改成果，您需要在許可的體系下進行。/,版權所有/,/,為感謝：中文版由正教會中華諸聖會提供。
喬爾丹維爾/,路喀跳轉/,福音經課/,選擇所需福音經課。

PHRASE.Value: YY年MMDD日WW
PHRASE.Comment: This will display a type similar to 1999年十月4日星期一. The permissible codes are WW for Weekname, DD for the day number, MM for the month, YY for the year. Any additonal formatting can be included such as comma after any number.

PHRASE.Comment: This is the 字體 to be used for 顯示 all the relevant information on screen for the Main interface. A blank entry of "" will 選擇 the default 字體.
The size of the 字體 for the Main interface, since some 語言s need a larger 字體 size to be legible. A blank entry will give the default value of 12.

This is the 字體 to be used for 顯示 information in the Liturgical aspect. At times, the 字體 of the Liturgics will be different from that of the main Screen (for example, Russian interface; Church Slavonic Liturgics).
The size of the 字體 for the Liturgics aspect (see FontFaceL) for explanation, since some 語言 need a larger 字體 size to be legible. A blank entry will give the default value of 12.
This is the mark to separate the different commemorations that are 顯示.
This is the mark to separate the readings.
This is for everytime that a colon is required.

This is the 2 letter ISO code for the given 語言. This will also determine component orientation, for example left-to-right, right-to-left (Hebrew, Arabic, Farsi), top-right-to-bottom-left (Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese), and top-left-to-bottom-right (Traditional Mongolian).
This is the 2 letter ISO code for the given country. This may be required later on for some things.

This is the Unicode location for the starting point of the numbers. Changing it to a different starting point will allow any non-Western decimal system to be used. For 'Arabic' numerals (0,1,2,3,4,5...) the starting point is 0!
This allows ideographic numerals to be 顯示 instead of the normal decimal based values, that is, 145 will be 顯示 as for example, CXLV. 1 = yes!

PHRASE.Value: HH時MM分
PHRASE.Comment: This gives the format for the time. The 24-hour clock will be used.

PHRASE.Value: 生平/,差遣頌/,特別旋律：/,集禱頌/,第TT調式/,; /,Information 關於 this commemoration 丟失.
PHRASE.Comment: A space (ifrequired) should be placed before and after the 2nd entry.

PHRASE.Value: 上一頁聖像/,下一頁聖像/,聖像文件找不到。

PHRASE.Note: This is how a colon is to appear in the given texts.

PHRASE.Value: （For %getN(^CC,Short)）
PHRASE.Comments: %getN is a generalised grammar engine that will return the appropriate grammatical form. The format is Noun (in this case to be specified so ^CC) and the desired case (as defined in the commemoration files)

PHRASE.Value: Name not found
PHRASE.Comments: Failure to find any name for a given commemoration!

PHRASE.Value: 🕃^NF
🕃^NF
🕂^NF
🕁^NF
🕀^NF

PHRASE.Note: This allows the time value to be displayed with at least the given number of digits. Must be equal to or greater than 1
This allows the time value to be displayed with at least the given number of digits. Must be equal to or greater than 1

There is no need to include the current language and its path up, as it will be searched by default. Similarly, only the lowest desired searachable path should be considered, as the programme will by default search up the tree from the given point.
